sections.heading: to obey order or resolution.Any person subject to this code who:(1) Violates or fails to obey any lawful general order or regulation;(2) Having knowledge of any other lawful order issued by a member of the military forces, which it is his duty to obey, fails to obey the order; or(3) Is derelict in t
sections.text: to obey order or resolution.Any person subject to this code who:(1) Violates or fails to obey any lawful general order or regulation;(2) Having knowledge of any other lawful order issued by a member of the military forces, which it is his duty to obey, fails to obey the order; or(3) Is derelict in the performance of his duties, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 64, p. 1577.
